My name is Rajat

I'm a hands-on software engineer with a passion for tackling mission-critical challenges using my machine learning and software engineering expertise.

Throughout my career, I've effortlessly worn multiple hats. From training over a billion-parameter model utlizing distributed GPUs, to leading two teams in creating an infinitely scalable and fault-tolerant Lakehouse for storing and querying terabytes of data. As a founding engineer, I scaled a personalized recommendation engine from scratch to generate over a million recommendations daily. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to tailor reporting solutions for enterprise needs. Additionally, I built a real-time personalized search engine, helping 100K users find parking spots effortlessly.
